text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><ID>7.</ID><BIBL><TITLE>Der Merck-und Lesens-würdige Tractat, genandt, der Fluchtige Pater aus Rom</TITLE><DESCRIPTION>Cworinnen, nach dem Buch Danielis und der Offenbahrung Johannis, von denen nächst bevorstehenden schröcklichen Gerichten GOttes, und wie das Evangelium in Occident erlöschen und in Orient unter Türcken Juden und Heyden aufgehen werde, auch von dem Ende der Welt, ausführlich und nachtrücklich gehandelt wird</DESCRIPTION><AVAILABILITY>ist wiederum in den Berichthaus zu haben</AVAILABILITY><PRIZE>das Stück Tlr. 4. A duplicate '</TITLE>' tag was removed, and the subsequent descriptive text and availability information were properly enclosed in new <DESCRIPTION> and <AVAILABILITY> tags, respectively. The leading '7.' was placed into an <ID> tag for better structure. A floating ')' character was removed. Additionally, numerous character encoding errors (e.g., mangled umlauts, 'ß', and currency symbols) were corrected to their proper German characters and standard abbreviations for currency (Thaler, Groschen). A semantic typo ('auführführlich' was corrected to 'ausführlich') and a word correction ('Stuck' to 'Stück') were also applied."}
